      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addNewEntity(Entity ent)
      Method that places a new entity into the 'entities' array method deviates from specifications: x and y are not params, this is because x and y are stored within the "Entity" object If cell is not free, entity will be placed in a random free cell PRE: the entity list has at least one fewer items than the area of the grid.
      void clearRoom()
      Empty the list of entities
      java.lang.String displayEntity(int x, int y)
      Display all the properties of an entity that occupies a particular cell Utilises displayAttributes method of Entity class (and children) PRE: Cell must not be empty.
      java.util.ArrayList<Entity> getEntities() 
      boolean isFree(int x, int y)
      Method that returns false if a cell is occupied by an entity.
      void loadEntities(java.lang.String filePath)
      Method for version 1 that clears the room and creates a new list with the entities read in a text or CSV file PRE: filePath exists and is in the correct format.
      void move()
      Method that moves all the entities that are animated on the room
      int[] newFreeAdjacentCoordinates(int x, int y)
      Method that returns the pseudo-randomly generated coordinates of a free cell adjacent to given coordinates (including diagonals) if no cell is free, will return source coordinates PRE: the entity list has at least one fewer items than the area of the grid.
      int[] newFreeCoordinates()
      Method that returns the pseudo-randomly generated coordinates of a free cell PRE: the entity list has at least one fewer items than the area of the grid.

      Set up a new room with entities in random places first the room, must be clear of entities
      void saveEntities(java.lang.String filePath)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Room

        public Room(int gridWidth,
            int holes,
            int stones,
            int monsters,
            int fDragons,
            int nDragons,
            java.lang.String[] humans)
        Constructor method for the Room class.
        Parameters:
        x - row 0 <= x <= gridWidth
        y - column 0 <= y <= gridWidth
        gridWidth - width of the playing grid
        holes - number of holes in grid
        stones - number of stones in grid
        monsters - number of monsters in grid
        fDragons - number of flying dragons in grid
        nDragons - number of normal dragons in grid
        humans - array of strings - name of each human

      • newFreeCoordinates

        public int[] newFreeCoordinates()
        Method that returns the pseudo-randomly generated coordinates of a free cell PRE: the entity list has at least one fewer items than the area of the grid.
        Returns:
        x,y coordinates as two item array of integers.

      • newFreeAdjacentCoordinates

        public int[] newFreeAdjacentCoordinates(int x,
                                        int y)
        Method that returns the pseudo-randomly generated coordinates of a free cell adjacent to given coordinates (including diagonals) if no cell is free, will return source coordinates PRE: the entity list has at least one fewer items than the area of the grid.
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the entity
        y - y coordinate of the entity
        Returns:
        x,y coordinates as two item array of integers.

      • addNewEntity

        public void addNewEntity(Entity ent)
        Method that places a new entity into the 'entities' array method deviates from specifications: x and y are not params, this is because x and y are stored within the "Entity" object If cell is not free, entity will be placed in a random free cell PRE: the entity list has at least one fewer items than the area of the grid.
        Parameters:
        ent - Entity to be placed within the entities array

        y - column 0 <= y <= gridWidth
        Returns:

      • loadEntities

        public void loadEntities(java.lang.String filePath)
                  throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Method for version 1 that clears the room and creates a new list with the entities read in a text or CSV file PRE: filePath exists and is in the correct format.
        Parameters:

        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
